title: Who Will Be the Master: Tech or Us? | Guest: Rep. Jim Jordan | 11/19/21
description:
Glenn explains a new narrative that we must choose and why it will fix the country. Tech company Voyager Labs uses social media and artificial intelligence to determine users' criminal capability. Despite every Republican and one Democrat voting against it, the House passed President Biden’s "Build Back Better" bill. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, discussing Biden's "Build Back Better" bill and the Rittenhouse trial. Rep. Jim Jordan joins to discuss the whistleblower email he received that confirmed the FBI is monitoring parents who speak out against school boards. Glenn discusses the science of Thanksgiving and how being thankful is beneficial to our health. Vice President Kamala Harris has been given presidential powers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
